column4: Good morning, I booted ubuntu this morning and it seems to have lost all the screen / grahpics cards settings, the x.org.conf still looks fine with all my old things in it
when i look in the the "Screen / resolution" applet it looks like my graphics cards / monitor are now not detected
im running at a riddiculously low res
Hmm I see now its seems my monitor has changed somehow, if thats possible
yeah it works, I didnt expect it to
But now, for example in nvidia X server settings app the screen is called "CRT-0" not the old name
used to be detected as "Acer AL1916W" (its still there in my x-config"
lol,.,. amarok will load a track from the command line by using the path u used earlier,.,. cheers for ur help
check ur compiz settings ,.,. r they still the same?
have u tryed restarting xwindows ,.,. just to see if its a 1 time think or does a reboot not work?
